pages.text: In the meantime, you have come into possession of many new materials. It's time to take a close look at each of them to see what effect they have on your [#](bb00bb)Potions[#]().\\Your educated guess, as an expert: Awesome!

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Instead of [#](bb00bb)Blaze Powder[#](), the Potion Workshop runs on [Mermaid's Gems](book://resources/mermaids_brush). Main advantage is that you don't have to fill your bottles with water before.
